content: yarn unders create a cross-stitch texture in this attractive crochet basket featuring bernat blanket extra thick this carry-all boasts sturdy sides and easy-to-grab handles that are worked in-line as you go the main body is stitched in the round using yarn under twisted single_crochet this thick and cozy basket is perfect for beautifully storing those bulkier items in your space materials bernat® blanket extra thick™ 21 2 oz/600 g 72 yds/66 m plantain 62076 3 balls or 208 yds/190 m gauges 2 single_crochet and 2 row = 4 10 cm 3 single_crochet and 2 5 row = 4 10 cm in scyuh pat measurements approx 18 45 5 cm diameter x 14½ 37 cm tall
